author: jgm
content:
Goerli is a proof of authority chain.  It is controlled by a handful of developers.  Nothing on it should have any value, because there is no decentralized security.  The chain could be turned off at any time (and it commonly is, although often not on purpose).

It is worth pointing out that this is an R&D server, as per its name.  More general proposals and discussions often happen at https://ethereum-magicians.org/
